title: Title
rule1: Create a members list and invite everyone to game.
rule2: Each member has to buy a gift for pick person.
rule3: Rest rules are yours, how many money you want to spend and so on...

c_privacy_text: The data you enter is used only for this site and will be deleted after 3 months. Use it only for have fun and DON'T provide here any sensitive data.
